newsitem.title: UK: Hong Kong Chinese Bank sets $70 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Hong Kong Chinese Bank sets $70 mln FRN.

text.p: The following Euro-Asian subordinated floating-rate issue was announced by lead manager ING Barings.
BORROWER HONG KONG CHINESE BANK LTD
TYPE STEP-UP FRN MARGIN *137.5 BP PAY DATE 27.MAR.97
LAST MOODY = ISS PRICE 99.50 FULL FEES 0.75
LISTING LUX DENOMS (K) 500 SALE LIMITS US/JP/SG
NEG PLG = CRS DEFLT = FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
NOTES *FOR YEARS ONE TO FIVE, THEN STEPS-UP TO 300 BP
**CALLABLE ON EVERY INTEREST PAYMENT DATE SUBJECT TO
THERE IS AN OWNERSHIP COVENANT, A DIVIDEND COVENANT
AND A MINIMUM RESERVE AND CAPITAL ACCOUNT COVENANT
